term.title: thixotropic gel

item.text: Gel which has a reduced viscosity on the application of a finite shear but which recovers its original viscosity when the shear is discontinued.

sources.item: PAC, 2007, 79, 1801. 'Definitions of terms relating to the structure and processing of sols, gels, networks, and inorganic-organic hybrid materials (IUPAC Recommendations 2007)' on page 1808 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac200779101801)
